content:
Hi Josh

What your experiencing is a confirmed bug as reported below.

https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/issues/8049

A fix has been applied and available for testing in beta version 13.0b4.

It's scheduled for inclusion in the v14 production release.
creator: platform34

content:
Hi James

Have you tried using Androids storage manager to confirm how much storage space your phone has left, if any. You can usually find it by searching your Android settings for "Storage".

It'll help you identify which apps and files are using the largest amount of storage space. You can then remove anything you don't need to free up space.
creator: platform34
